1.0.2.en: Improved error handling. Added min and max limits for thermostat. Changed icon for Tune driver.

1.1.0.en: Bug fixes. Added device for outdoor temp sensor. Added flow cards activating/deactivating the use of an indoor sensor. Added flow cards for triggering on outdoor temperature changes and control value changes. Added step-by-step guide for how to set up the access token.

1.1.1.en: Improved handling of polling the Ngenic API. Changed icons for Tune and Outdoor Temp Sensor drivers.

1.2.0.en: Added flow cards for activating/deactivating control on spot price. Updated README files. Changed license to MIT.
